depreciate.translation[0].definitions[0]: to decrease in value or price
New cars depreciate in value quickly.
depreciate.translation[0].definitions[1]: to reduce the value of something over time, especially for tax purposes
Company computers are depreciated at 50% per year.

depreciate.translation[1].definitions[0]: to decrease in value over a period of time

depreciate.translation[1].definitions[1]: if a currency depreciates, it goes down in value compared to the currencies of other countries
